publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3902 Robert Brown: Centenary of the 113th Glasgow (Burnside) Scout Group—That the Parliament congratulates the 113th Glasgow (Burnside) Scout Group on attaining its centenary in 2009; notes the extensive programme of events to commemorate the centenary taking place during the year, including the civic reception by South Lanarkshire Council in Rutherglen Town Hall on Friday 3 April; is grateful for the contribution made by scouting over the last 100 years to the lives of thousands of young people through the work of the 113th and other scout groups throughout Scotland, and recognises the huge input made by present and past scout leaders of the 113th to providing exciting, adventurous and stimulating activities that widen the life chances of young people in the area. Supported by: Jim Tolson*, Des McNulty*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Ross Finnie*, James Kelly*
S3M-3902 Centenary of the 113th Glasgow (Burnside) Scout Group (lodged on 14 April 2009) Bill Aitken*, Mike Pringle*, Bob Doris*
S3M-3902 Centenary of the 113th Glasgow (Burnside) Scout Group (lodged on 14 April 2009) Cathy Peattie*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3902 Centenary of the 113th Glasgow (Burnside) Scout Group (lodged on 14 April 2009) Stuart McMillan*
